S08n650:1: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamalokya,
S08n650:3: śṛṇu mañjuśrīḥ ! tvadīye sarvārthakriyākarmapaṭalavisaraṃ pūrvanirdiṣṭaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamadhye savistaraṃ vakṣye'ham |
S08n650:7: yakṣarāṭ stuṣṭamanaso mūrdhni kṛtvā tu añjalim ||
S08n650:20: karma karmaphalaṃ sarvaṃ kriyākālaṃ tathaiva ca |
S08n650:21: pātraṃ sthānaṃ tathā veṣaṃ svapnaprasaṅge pracoditam ||
S08n650:23: bhadrakalpe tu ye buddhāḥ saptamo'yaṃ śākyapuṅgavaḥ ||
S08n650:27: vajrapāṇistu taṃ yakṣo bodhisattvo namasya tam ||
S08n650:42: buddhavācoditaḥ śuddho vāce gāthāṃ saptamo muniḥ |
S08n650:44: śreyasi sarvahite jagati praṇitāro śuddhyatu tiṣṭhatu mokṣavihūnām ||
S08n650:45: satyayākṣayavīryavāṃ hi taccittā madamaitraratā sa tadānaratā ye |
S08n650:46: siddhibhave sada teṣu janeṣu nānya kathañcana siddhimupeṣye ||
S08n650:47: mantravare sada tuṣṭiratā ye śāsani cakradhare tathā mañjudhare vā |
S08n650:48: dharṣayimāra pravarttayi cakraṃ so'pi ha cakradharo iha yuktaḥ ||
S08n650:55: rūpyaḥ arūpyā tathā abhūmā kāmikadivyaṃ nṛjā manujā vā |
S08n650:56: yogina siddhiṃ gatā atha loke sarvaviśiṣṭa tathā naramukhyā ||
S08n650:57: sattvamasau na sa vidyati kaścid yo pratijāni tu tasya śriyā me |
S08n650:58: eṣa siriparikalpitatulyaṃ mañjusirīti pratijāni tu buddhāḥ ||
S08n650:60: eṣa kṛtā tava saṃjñitakalpe divya anāgatabuddhamatītaiḥ ||
S08n650:61: nāmaśruṇi paryastava śuddho nāsya mano bhavi ekamano vā |
S08n650:62: tasya mimaṃ śivaśānti bhaveyaṃ bodhivarā bhavi agraviśiṣṭā ||
S08n650:63: mantra aśeṣa tu siddha bhaveyā uttamayoni gati lebhe |
S08n650:64: uttamidharmi samāśrayi nitya vighnavivarjita siddhi bhaveyā ||
S08n650:65: īpsitamantra prasādhayi sarvāṃ kṣipra sa gacchati bodhi ha mañjum |
S08n650:66: lapsyati bodhigato munimukhyaḥ gatva niṣīdati sattvahitārtham ||
S08n650:67: buddhayi bodhipravartayi cakraṃ eṣa guṇo kathito jinamukhyaiḥ |
S08n650:68: mañjuriti śirīṃ tvayi saṃsmari nāmaṃ acintyaguṇāḥ kathitā jinamukhyaiḥ ||
S08n650:70: kalpabhaṇe yā na śakyamasaṅkhyaiḥ mantraśatā tava śuddhakumāra ! ||
S08n650:72: eṣaṃ kumāra tha sarvagatā vai śāsana tubhya ratottama vīrāḥ ||
S08n650:74: na kramimantra tmadīya kadāciṃ nāpi kathañciha ye tava mantray || iti ||
